body:
Mr. Kitten humor indeed.  The opening line of this is "A world where there are 500 women for every man."  On page 11 we have our MC show up  via Truck Kun. He's a typical Otaku nerd who's suddenly transported to the 'Color' World.  Initially he's pretty freaked out by all violence and cannibalism, but 4 or 5 pages later, our heroine and MC trusty side kick (Mei Lei) thrusts a freshly roasted pussymeat in his mouth, and the lights go on.  This place is heaven!  Fuck all the beautiful women you want, and then eat them, life don't get no better.

Pg 37-40 is hilarious, the 3 female soldiers are turned into roadsigns, and the real author helpfully points out, "don't do this, they'll attract crows, and stink".  All the while, the girl officer is thinking about how brilliant this is, and it's true art that will last 100 years.

This is top notch material.
U really gotta do that to us?
Ahhhh my eyeballs need a dry cleaning

I love this series so much.  I've thought about stuff like this for decades, and here it is, slowly being translated by me.  Most of the haters don't realize there's  a lot of rather dry humor in it, which tickles my funny bone.  I wish there was a better title for it, though I call it, Regiment XX Battles On.  I'm hoping well see more of the XX as the munch their way across the battlefields of the world.
Jesus Christ. Hentai has really degraded my morality.

what the hell is this 
Pretty sure not interested in this
Pretty sure my dick just cringed 0/10
